mapper.select: WITH T3 AS (SELECT T.DANW_ID, T.DANW_NO, T.YEZ_ID, T.DANW_NAME, T.LIANX_STAFF, T.LIANXR_PHONE, T.DIZ_PHONE, T1.YEZ_NAME FROM JC_DWZL T LEFT JOIN JC_HZZL T1 ON T.YEZ_ID = T1.YEZ_ID),DETAIL AS ( select ROWNUM AS "RowNumber", T3.DANW_ID AS "DanwId", T3.DANW_NO AS "DanwNo", T3.YEZ_ID AS "YezId", T3.DANW_NAME AS "DanwName", T3.LIANX_STAFF AS "LianxStaff", T3.LIANXR_PHONE AS "lianxrPhone", T3.DIZ_PHONE AS "Adress", T3.YEZ_NAME AS "YezName" from T3) SELECT * FROM DETAIL WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND "RowNumber"> #{limit}*(#{page}-1)
